original_text: Earlier when David was fighting with Edom, Joab the commander of the army, who had gone up to bury the dead, had struck down all the men in Edom.
korean_text: 전에 다윗이 에돔에 있을 때에 군대 지휘관 요압이 가서 죽임을 당한 자들을 장사하고 에돔의 남자를 다 쳐서 죽였는데

sentences.original_text: Earlier when David was fighting with Edom
Joab the commander of the army
who had gone up to bury the dead
had struck down all the men in Edom
